Keywords: Guardians of the Galaxy , Pirate , Ravagers , Wakanda
Real Name: T'Challa
Special Powers
LET ME INTRODUCE YOU TO THE FAMILY I MADE ALONG THE WAY: When establishing themed teams, characters on your starting force with the Minions of Thanos, Ravagers, or Wakanda keyword gain the Guardians of the Galaxy keyword.
WAKANDAN BORN, RAVAGER TRAINED: Energy Shield/Deflection, Super Senses.
